definitions.text: a periodic publication containing pictures and stories and articles of interest to those who purchase it or subscribe to it
examples: it takes several years before a magazine starts to break even or make money

definitions.text: product consisting of a paperback periodic publication as a physical object
examples: tripped over a pile of magazines

definitions.text: a business firm that publishes magazines
a light-tight supply chamber holding the film and supplying it for exposure as required
a storehouse (as a compartment on a warship) where weapons and ammunition are stored
a metal frame or container holding cartridges; can be inserted into an automatic gun
